title: Produce Documents in Discovery
description: After completing a document review, a paralegal needs to produce the 'Responsive' and non-privileged documents to the opposing counsel.

tasks.description: In the e-discovery platform, select all documents tagged as 'Responsive' and not tagged as 'Privileged'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the set of documents to be produced.

tasks.description: Export the selected documents as text-searchable PDFs with their original metadata.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the production set in the correct format.

tasks.description: Share the production set with opposing counsel via a secure file transfer link.
tasks.expected_outcome: The documents are successfully and securely produced.
